content.description: Sit start on the left side of the boulder with feet on the small left wall (It is really hard without it). Work up following the rightward slant of the boulder to an intense top out. (From Peter's Guide to Duluth Bouldering)
content.location: The down stream side of the boulder. On the left looking back upstream.

content.description: sit start matched on the obvious rail. move up and right to gain the underclings then top out out right.
content.location: the overhung face just to the right of "a romance with the woman of your dreams"

content.description:
Sit start in the cave on a big flake. Work up through the small dihedral in the boulder. Follow the small crack up to a scary top out. (From Peter's Guide to Duluth Bouldering)   

  Top out is very tall, and landing is questionable. The climbing in the top 1/3 of the route is easier than down low.
content.location: The down stream side of the boulder. Starts slightly under the boulder on the left.

content.description:
Sit Start hugging the overhanging arete.  Left hand on a high crimp, right hand on a slopey crimp.  Work up the arete to a good jug below the roof.  Traverse the horizontal crack until you can go big to the overhanging boulder.  Finish on the route A Romance With the Woman of Your Dreams.(From Peter's Guide to Duluth Bouldering)

 Higher water levels put the landing into the stream.
content.protection: A lot of pads 5+?  Attentive spotters/pad movers.
content.location: Start 2ish ft. to the right of Snowball Effect, underneath the boulder.

content.description: Start same as Snowball Effect. Do the first few moves, than work right.  Use a kneebar to transition into Eli.

Stand start on a sloping jug. Work your way out the bulge through fun compression moves.  This route has some of the better rock quality on the boulder.

 Be careful of the wall behind you.

 Variation: You can start same as Asian Porn and climb into the start of Eli for a very nice V7.  Hint, kneebars.
content.protection: Pads. Be careful of the wall behind you.  Maybe hang a pad if you dont feel solid on the last few moves.
content.location: The start hold is the same large triangle sloper-jug you use on Asian Porn before you cut right.

content.description: Sit start on a jug at the bottom of the fissure crack. Follow the crack into Snowball Effect. (From Peter's Guide to Duluth Bouldering)
content.location: The down stream side of the boulder.

climbs.name: A Romance With the Woman of Your Dreams

content.description:
Jump start on a crimp or a slopey pinch underneath the overhanging boulder. Compress your way out of the cave and finish up the expose face. Right main boulder and left wall are off. Amazing route. (From Peter's Guide to Duluth Bouldering) 

  High water levels put the landing in the stream and makes protection impossible.
content.location: On the upstream side of the boulders. Starts on the underside of the smaller, higher boulder.

content.description: the large boulder that forms a bridge over the creek.
